text: Anisur Rahman is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Undivided Mymensingh-6 and Mymensingh-7. He was the organizer of the Liberation War of Bangladesh. ==Career== Rahman Rahman was elected to parliament from Undivided Mymensingh-6 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1973. He was elected to parliament from Mymensingh-7 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1988. He was the organizer of the Liberation War of Bangladesh. He lost the 5th Jatiya Sangsad elections of 1991 from the Mymensingh-7 constituency with the nomination of Jatiya Party. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Awami League politicians Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Anisur Rahman (Bangladeshi politician)
